column1: Nali was a Dwarves of Lonely Mountain invented for Vivendis The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game). He was voiced by an uncredited Tom Kane.
Nali was on business in Eriador
column2: and stayed the night in Bree. He was surprised a Hobbits named Frodo Baggins knew of the Kingdom under the Mountain.The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)
